Bibliographic References: PP, no. 264, pi. 31 b; PPSupp, no. 356; Gli lndigeni, fig. 66; Dewailly, MEFRA 94, 1982, p. 594, fig. 7.
Imagery Description: Woman wearing black cape, pouring libation to warrior standing in front of his horse, which he holds by the bridle, and above which a bird is flying with a wreath.
